name: Ely and the crab
description:
This is our first game. We mainly wanted to make something story-driven so don't expect a lot of raw gameplay.

 ← ↑ → ↓ keys to move around. Spacebar to interact.

The game was made for the 162nd weekly game jam, the theme was "crabs".

Story, code, sound and music : Arisu (@ArisuOngaku)
Story and art : kwarel (@aquarelleouate)

Art made with aseprite.

Additional music : Chris Zabriskie - Direct to Video

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJGam

Hope you'll enjoy !
